item.title: Amazon stopping TV ads
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: Telling for how bad TV ads are versus providing true value to customers, Amazon will stop running ads on TV altogether and will rely solely on word-of-mouth to drive sales: "Over the last couple of years, we have come to understand how low prices drive volume," said Mr. Bezos, a former Wall Street trader. "We think we get a better return giving the money to customers instead of television networks."
